tagline: Your private music practice journal, built for and by musicians

version.title: Version Information
version.issueReportingDescription: When reporting issues on GitHub, please include this version information:

about.title: About Mirubato
about.what: Mirubato helps you get the most out of your practice. Whether you're working on sight-reading or perfecting a piece, we provide the tools to track your progress and stay motivated.
about.why: We believe consistent, mindful practice is the key to musical growth. Mirubato is designed to be a simple, encouraging companion on your musical journey.
about.how: Mirubato is open-source and built with a local-first approach. This means your data stays with you, on your device, by default. No tracking, no analyticsâ€”just you and your music.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Mirubato is proudly open-source. We welcome contributions from the community and believe in building great things together, transparently.

privacy.title: Privacy & Your Data
privacy.intro: This privacy policy explains how Mirubato processes your personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.info: Mirubato (contact: privacy@mirubato.com) is the data controller responsible for your personal data.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.consent: Consent: For optional features like cloud sync and analytics
legalBasis.contract: Contract Performance: To provide our music practice tracking services
legalBasis.legitimate: Legitimate Interest: For security, fraud prevention, and service improvement

dataWeCollect.title: Personal Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.account: Account Data: Email address, display name, authentication method (Google OAuth or magic link)
dataWeCollect.profile: Profile Data: Primary instrument, musical goals, preferences (all optional)
dataWeCollect.practice: Practice Data: Logbook entries, goals, repertoire, sheet music, practice sessions, progress tracking
dataWeCollect.technical: Technical Data: Device ID, browser type, operating system, IP address, login timestamps, sync metadata
dataWeCollect.usage: Usage Data: Feature usage, session duration, performance metrics (anonymized when possible)
dataWeCollect.device: Device Information: Screen resolution, timezone, language preference, device specifications for sync

dataWeStore.title: How We Store and Process Your Data
dataWeStore.localFirst: Local Storage: Data is primarily stored locally on your device using browser storage (localStorage, IndexedDB)
dataWeStore.cloudSync: Cloud Storage: Optional sync uses Cloudflare's secure global network with end-to-end encryption
dataWeStore.location: Data Location: EU and worldwide through Cloudflare's edge network, with appropriate safeguards
dataWeStore.security: Security: Industry-standard encryption, secure authentication, regular security audits
dataWeStore.retention: Data Retention: Account data retained while active; practice data for 7 years or until deletion request

dataWeShare.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataWeShare.noSelling: We never sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties
dataWeShare.noAds: We don't use your data for advertising or marketing purposes
dataWeShare.noTracking: We don't use tracking cookies or third-party analytics beyond essential functionality
dataWeShare.noThirdParty: We don't share your practice data with third parties without explicit consent
dataWeShare.service: Service Providers: We use Cloudflare for hosting and Google for authentication (both GDPR-compliant)
dataWeShare.legal: Legal Requirements: We may disclose data if required by law or to protect our rights

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.essential: Essential Cookies: Required for authentication, security, and core functionality
cookies.functional: Functional Cookies: Language preferences, settings, device recognition for sync
cookies.noTracking: No Tracking: We don't use advertising cookies, social media trackers, or analytics cookies
cookies.control: Cookie Control: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings

yourRights.title: Your GDPR Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.access: Right of Access: Request copies of your personal data and information about processing
yourRights.rectification: Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data
yourRights.erasure: Right to Erasure ('Right to be Forgotten'): Request deletion of your personal data
yourRights.restrict: Right to Restrict Processing: Limit how we process your personal data
yourRights.portability: Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
yourRights.object: Right to Object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
yourRights.withdraw: Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for consent-based processing
yourRights.complain: Right to Complain: Lodge a complaint with your data protection authority
yourRights.exercise: How to Exercise Rights: Contact privacy@mirubato.com or use the privacy controls in the app

dataSubjectRequests.title: Data Subject Requests
dataSubjectRequests.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days (extended to 60 days for complex requests)
dataSubjectRequests.verification: We may need to verify your identity before processing your request
dataSubjectRequests.format: Data will be provided in commonly used, machine-readable formats (JSON, CSV)
dataSubjectRequests.free: Requests are generally free, though excessive requests may incur a reasonable fee

automated.title: Automated Decision Making
automated.info: We do not use automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal or significant effects

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.cloudflare: Data may be processed in Cloudflare data centers worldwide, protected by Standard Contractual Clauses
international.adequacy: We ensure appropriate safeguards for all international transfers

breach.title: Data Breach Notification
breach.notification: We will notify affected users within 72 hours of discovering any data breach that may affect your rights

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.info: Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.

changes.title: Privacy Policy Changes
changes.notification: We will notify users of material changes to this policy via email or in-app notification
changes.effective: Changes become effective 30 days after notification

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.response: We aim to respond to privacy inquiries within 48 hours
